original: Johansson, Anders Gustav, direktör, Växjö, f. m/sm i Malma, Skarab. 1., av Johan Andersson o. Ida Lindberg. G. 38 m. Britta Johansson. Barn: Eva f. 41, Christina 43. — Fodkhögsk. 26-27, kontr :assist :kurs 29, självstud. Kontr :assist. 29-32, omb :man f. bon-deförb. o. SLU i Kronob. 1. 32-41, verkst. dir. i Nya Växjöbladets Boktryckeri A-B ’sed. 40. Led. av styr. f. nämnda föret, samt A-B Djäknen sed. 40, ordf. i Växjö stads kristidsnd 41-42, sekr. i Växjö lokalavd. av RPO sed. 38, sekr. o. kassör i Kronob. distr. av bondeförb. sed. 34, rev. i bondeförb. riksorg. ’sed. 43, i Växjöortens jord-braikskas’s’a sed. 34 m. fl. s;amim;anislutn., led. av stadsifiullm. sed. 47.
translated:
Johansson, Anders Gustav, director, Växjö, born in Malma, Skaraborg County. Son of Johan Andersson and Ida Lindberg. Married in 1938 to Britta Johansson. Children: Eva (born in 1941), Christina (born in 1943). 

Education: Higher Agricultural College, 1926-1927. Contract Assistant Course, 1929. Self-study Contract Assistant, 1929-1932. Representative for Farmers' Association and Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences in Kronoberg County, 1932-1941. Executive Director at Nya Växjöbladets Boktryckeri AB since 1940. Board member of the mentioned company as well as AB Djäknen since 1940. Chairman of Växjö City Crisis Committee, 1941-1942. Secretary of the Växjö Local Branch of the Farmers' Political Organization since 1938. Secretary and treasurer of the Farmers' Association District in Kronoberg County since 1934. Auditor of the Farmers' Association National Organization since 1943. Member of Växjö Region Agricultural Cooperative since 1934, among others. Member of the City Welfare Board since 1947.

workExperience.title: Representative for Farmers' Association and Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences

affiliations.name: Växjö Local Branch of the Farmers' Political Organization
Farmers' Association District in Kronoberg County
